title: Controlled Building Access, Close To BART And Muni
posting_body: ['Vara', '1600 15th St, San Francisco, CA, 94103', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 7', 'OR Text', '7', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Welcome Home!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 800 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Welcome to Vara, a stylish residential community featuring new studio, 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom apartments in San Francisco's Mission District.", 'Spacious layouts and premium amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apt for rent in San Francisco?', 'Enjoy the perks of interior features such as gourmet kitchens with hardwoodstyle cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and beautiful quartz countertops.', 'Just steps from your door you can take advantage of community features like a tech room for getting work done, a courtyard for socializing and lounging, and a state-of-the-art fitness center for working out.', "Vara is a chic retreat located in one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods.", 'Welcome home.', 'Features', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Abundant Phone, TV And High-Speed Data Ports', '- Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances Including Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Glass Top Oven And Built-In Microwave', '- Vibrant San Francisco City Views*', '- Many Floor Plans With Flex Space (Extra Bedroom, Office, Den Or Expanded Living Space)', '- Expansive Double Pane Windows', '- Gourmet Kitchen With Hardwood-Style Cabinets In 4 Finish Options And Stainless Steel Basin Sink With Pullout Spray Faucet', '- In-Home Washers And Dryers', '- High Ceilings', '- Variety Of Unique Floorplans, Some Featuring Lofts', 'And / Or Dens', '- Private Patios Or Balconies*', '*Varies By Floorplan And Location', 'Community Amenities', '- Storage Units Available', '- Close To BART And Muni', '- Walking Distance To Vibrant Mission District Shopping, Dining And Entertainment Options', '- Courtyard With Social Seating Areas, Barbecue, Lounge & Sunning Hill', '- Fitness Center With Health Club-Quality Equipment Including Built In Xbox 360 And Kinect System', '- Controlled Building Access', '- Abundant Bicycle Parking And Bike Repair Shop Including Fully Equipped Workbench', '- Free Wi-Fi In Common Area Locations', '- Easy Access To Bay Bridge And 101 & 280 Freeways', '- Clubhouse With Catering Kitchen And Professional-Quality Bar With High End Sound System', '- Garage Parking With Car Lockers', '- Tech Room / Meeting Room With A Sound-Proof Music Practice Room And A Private Tele-Conference Room', '- Smoke-Free Community', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly (Restrictions Apply)', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', '9xnRtRK0yL2']
